website_summaries.verdict: Provides quick results for both good and bad cholesterol levels with a savvy online report based on lab results.
pros: An at-home cholesterol test with added online benefits
This kit allows you to conduct cholesterol tests yourself and then mail away for professional analysis
Comes with all the testing bells in whistles from blood collection units to pre-paid return envelopes
cons: Some customers note the analysis comes back incorrect and doesn't pair to a doctor's exam

customer_reviews.title: Skip this and go to a lab.
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money, in my opinion. The Lancers they send don't prick at all and the amount of blood they want is way too much. It's worth the slightly additional cost to pop in to a lab test place and get your blood drawn properly. Had high Hope's for this :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazoning Customer

customer_reviews.title: Analysis quick and seems right
customer_reviews.text: The analysis was back 3 days after mailing and seems to match other data. Blood collection is not easy (it takes more blood than you think)...watching the video beforehand helps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Possible inaccurate results
customer_reviews.text: 3 weeks before I completed the EverlyWell home cholesterol I had a cholesterol test done at a hospital in Mexico. My total cholesterol was 155 in Mexico. The result from Everlywell was 204. Also my LDL cholesterol measured by EverlyWell was low at 95. Based on the total cholesterol of 204 I would expect a much higher LDL than 95. The bottom line is that I don't have faith in the EverlyWell results
customer_reviews.author: David Blackler

customer_reviews.title: Not what presented
customer_reviews.text: I thought by the way this was presented that the results would be at home. I didn't know you had to pay for the kid and then send them to a lab for analysis. Double the money easier to go to the doctors and get a more accurate result.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Poor sample procedures and really bad customer service.
customer_reviews.text: The kit was not easy to use. The sample required was difficult to process and comply with the requirements. The sample I submitted was unacceptable to the lab. I received an email advising me to request a new sample kit at no cost. I have done so 2 times. I have not heard anything from the company regarding a retest. I have no confidence in the procedure for the test not their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: PM2

customer_reviews.title: Junk  Avoid  Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. You need a LOT of blood. Three drops does not work, so be prepared to be sticking your finger a lot just to get anywhere near close enough. They also use labs all around the country that are not there’s. They say 2-4 days, but mine has been processing for over 10 days. If you email support, all they can do is email the lab. My lab has apparently not returned the call. Just go to Quest or Lab Corp. they return results in 24-48 hours.
customer_reviews.author: craig

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work . Filter paper did not diffuse blood to marked line. The person I talk to a customer service sorry can't remember her name was so helpful and sent me another kit and it did work properly it's possible that I did not have enough blood I might have been dehydrated the 2nd time worked perfect waiting for the
customer_reviews.author: mitchell  pozner

customer_reviews.title: So convenient to do the test at home -results came ...
customer_reviews.text: So convenient to do the test at home -results came back in an acceptable amount of time. Would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Gabet

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Had technical problem with first kit. Company sent out replacement at no charge. Can't ask for more than that.
customer_reviews.author: T Bear

customer_reviews.title: Watch out people in New York, New Jersey, Rhode Island
customer_reviews.text: They never mentioned that people living in New York, New Jersey, Rhode Island won't be able to register the kit
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Vidal

customer_reviews.title: A very good idea
customer_reviews.text: The convenience of finding out about your cholesterol without trekking to the Dr. is a good thing. Be sure to find the Instructions FIRST before messing with the needles - one push on them and they are unusable. Also REGISTER as well, so you get your results back. You have to load up the smear with enough so it can be processed. Stay well.
customer_reviews.author: Farm Fatale

customer_reviews.title: Seems accurate
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for myself, and one for my spouse. Both results are almost what the doctor blood tests show. I'm about to order another for my spouse. Her cholesterol is high and is on meds now, so we need to retest. I will (hopefully) update this review with the results --12/18/2018
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Poor accuracy
customer_reviews.text: This test is not accurate. About a month after using the Everlywell test, I got a lipids panel from my internist. The total cholesterol and LDL direct were overestimated by 30% by Everlywell.
customer_reviews.author: G. Lombardi

customer_reviews.title: Complete waste of $
customer_reviews.text: The absolute worst product I have ever wasted money on.. After 3 kitsch they could not give me an accurate test. Save your money and go to a real doctor.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree C.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: Complete waste of time and money. I did the test twice. It was rejected both times. I would rather try a different product at this point
customer_reviews.author: Jrenard

customer_reviews.title: Lost test
customer_reviews.text: My test was lost by them at my $ loss.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and simple way to get some numbers on your health progress from your own home.
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to use and send into the lab with the included label and shipping pouch. The whole process took about 8 days to get my lab results back. You create and account and it is easy to view / print your lab report. The numbers were in line with tests I've done elsewhere and are as accurate as anywhere else. I am going to do this again in 1 year via EverlyWell. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Kaolinite

customer_reviews.title: Fraudulent company - go to a lab
customer_reviews.text: This company's tests don't work more than 75% of the time - my husband and I both had to re-take ours multiple times, and it never worked. Everlywell will not respond to our emails, and no longer answers their phones. Steer clear, you'll be poking yourself in the finger for nothing!!
customer_reviews.author: OutdoorMama

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Tests
customer_reviews.text: Do not trust these tests. I was super stressed out because my cholesterol test said my cholesterol was 250. When I went to my doctor I took the test at their lab a week later and my cholesterol was 185. There is no way this test is accurate and I’m locked into a subscription which is bulcrap. I stressed for days and all for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Results match dr.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this directly from the company and the results were comparable to what they were in my Dr.'s lab. I worked as a medical tech for 20+ years, so I think I'm good at collecting a good blood sample.
customer_reviews.author: LeeAnn

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable.
customer_reviews.text: Just wait untill you need to contact them ( impossible) or request a refund because they couldn’t process your blood test. THIS IS NOT A RELIABLE COMPANY. GO TO A REAL LAB!!
customer_reviews.author: Carmine Bove

product_meta.title: Everlywell Cholesterol and Lipids Test - at Home - CLIA-Certified Adult Test - Accurate Blood Analysis of HDL, LDL and Triglyceride Levels - Not Available in NY, NJ, RI
feature_bullets: HELPFUL TEST - This easy-to-use, at-home test is ideal for anyone monitoring their cholesterol or interested in learning about their current levels. The test measures total cholesterol, HDL, direct LDL, and triglycerides.

CONVENIENT, AT-HOME SAMPLE COLLECTION - Test includes everything you need for sample collection (only a small amount of blood is needed as a sample). The prepaid shipping label included with the test makes it easy to send your sample to the lab for analysis. Due to an increase in demand, you'll get your test results on our secure online platform up to 5-8 days after the lab receives your sample.

EASY-TO-UNDERSTAND RESULTS - Gain meaningful insights about your health with easy-to-understand test results. Download and share with your healthcare provider, family, or friends. We also provide you with additional resources and helpful tips along the way.

CERTIFIED LABS - Each partner lab we choose to work with is CLIA-certified (Clinical Laboratory Improvement Amendments). This means they have to meet high standards to obtain both state and federal certifications and submit themselves to regular inspections.

PHYSICIAN-REVIEWED - Everlywell test orders and results are reviewed and approved by an independent board-certified physician within your state. Not available in the following states: New York, New Jersey, and Rhode Island. Test taker must be 18+.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
